sentences: Hinton was raised by his mother, a music teacher, on a farm in Pennsylvania.
He began playing drums at about seven years old, eventually developing interests in electronic dance music and Baltimore club music as he entered his college years at Brown University.

Upon graduating with a degree in physics, Hinton briefly worked in a lab and as a music teacher at Brown before turning his attention full-time to his music career with the release of his 2013 album Nonfiction.
After spending much of his post-graduate music career in Providence, Rhode Island, Hinton now lives in New York City.
To create his album Potential (released March 25, 2016), he spent over 200 hours scanning obscure YouTube clips for audio samples.
